short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Add a Google Maps button to Google search results

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Discover my Chrome extension that simplifies your web browsing by adding a Google Maps button directly to Google search results.

No more copying and pasting addresses or wasting time manually searching for places.

With this extension, you can open Google Maps with a single click from the search results.

Download my extension now and enhance your search experience with integrated Google Maps!
